metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26142 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the kernel in OpenBSD 6.6. The WEP, WPA, WPA2,and WPA3 implementations treat fragmented frames as full frames. Anadversary can abuse this to inject arbitrary network packets, independentof the network configuration.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
